description: Prepare charge slurry raw materials and blend to baseline specs
Feed conditioned slurry into Reactor R12 and establish flow
Execute experimental adjustments during R12 charge trial batch
Charge monomers and initiate polymerization sequence in R13
Maintain catalyst and temperature conditions through main reaction
Run post-cure bake profile for polymer resin finishing
Transfer conditioned bulk product into intermediate storage
Commission and validate revised transfer sequence for version 3
Execute aseptic preparation prior to sterile filling operations
Sort and stage deviated material for rework processing
Run clean-in-place loop across fill line circuits
Perform rinse stage of Reactor R12 CIP sequence
Apply passivation chemistry during updated R12 CIP
Run chromatography analysis and collect QC fractions
Prepare aliquots and controls for stability testing campaign
Mix and sterilize media used in microbiological testing
Blend bulk ingredients in main mixer and monitor torque
Discharge blender sample product and stage for drying
Apply labels and verify serialization on packaged units
